sentences.en: All prices listed are in ZAR.
sentences.cn: 所有价格都是用南非兰特列出的。

sentences.en: Check if all the configurations listed above have been performed.
sentences.cn: 检查是否执行了上面列出的所有配置。

sentences.en: He listed four dependents on his income - tax form.
sentences.cn: 他在所得税申报表上填写家属四人.
他被列为战斗失踪人员。

sentences.en: He was not listed under his real name on the residents panel.
sentences.cn: 他未以真名在居民名册上登记。

sentences.en: He's been wait-listed for a football scholarship to Stanford.
sentences.cn: 他已被列入斯坦福大学的美式足球奖学金等候者名单。

sentences.en: Her name is listed in the telephone directory.
sentences.cn: 她的名字被列在了电话号码簿上.

sentences.en: It is listed among the ingredients on the package.
sentences.cn: 它是包装盒标明的成分之一。

sentences.en: Oxford United have transfer-listed two midfield players.
sentences.cn: 牛津联足球俱乐部已把两名中场球员列入转会名单。

sentences.en: Select any one of the listed files to open and edit it in the respective editor.
sentences.cn: 选择任意一个列出的文件，以在各自的编辑器中打开并编辑它。

sentences.en: She was long-listed for the senior team last year.
sentences.cn: 她去年被列入了一线队初选名单。

sentences.en: Some of Australia's largest listed companies are expected to announce huge interim earnings this week.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚最大的一些上市公司预计将在本周宣布巨额中期盈利。

sentences.en: The items are listed in order of importance.
sentences.cn: 这些项目是按其重要性的顺序列出的.

sentences.en: The names are listed in alphabetical order .
sentences.cn: 姓名是按字母顺序排列的。

sentences.en: The officers were listed in order of seniority.
sentences.cn: 官员列名以职位高低为序.

sentences.en: The pupils were asked to list the sports they loved most and hated most.
sentences.cn: 学生们被要求列出他们最喜欢的和最讨厌的运动。

sentences.en: The relationships I have and that I consider to be meaningful have all of the qualities listed above.
sentences.cn: 我拥有的人脉，其中我认为有意义的关系包含上述列出的所有品质。

sentences.en: The trees all listed to leeward.
sentences.cn: 树木统统向下风方向倾.

sentences.en: There are ten English classes listed in the timetable.

phrases.tran_cn: 上市公司，股票上市的公司
上市证券；交易所挂牌证券
交易所登记股票；上场股票

trans.tran_cn: 列入文物保护名册的，登记上市的
trans.tran_en: a listed company is one which offers its shares for sale on the stock exchange
To list several things such as reasons or names means to write or say them one after another, usually in a particular order
